title: Scottish Hill Races Data
description:
Description
The record times in 1984 (hills) for 35 Scottish hill races,
or in 2000 (hills2000) for 56 hill races.  The hills2000
dataset is the subset of races2000 for which type
is hill.
reference:
A.C. Atkinson (1986) Comment: Aspects of diagnostic regression
analysis. Statistical Science  1, 397-402.

parameters.timef:
record time in hours for females, in the
hills2000 dataset.
parameters.climb: total height gained during the route, in feet

format:
distdistance, in miles (on the map)

climbtotal height gained during the route, in feet

timerecord time in hours

timefrecord time in hours for females, in the
hills2000 dataset.
